ygData.msgSnippet: Flaming the tech support in chat, join in! Kelvyn Zhuang Zhenguang, 8th Dan Kendo goondu, carrying 2 shinais into Verant s office
ygData.messageBody:
Flaming the tech support in chat, join in!

Kelvyn Zhuang Zhenguang, 8th Dan Kendo goondu, carrying 2 shinais into Verant's
office
